REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1031 reute d f BC-HUNTINGDON-<HRCLY.O> 04-27 0062

TEXT.TITLE: HUNTINGDON <HRCLY.O> IN ACQUISITION TALKS
TEXT.BODY: Huntingdon International Holdings plc said it has entered into discussions with a view to acquiring Northern Engineering and Testing Inc, a company based mainly in the northwestern United States. The company said Northern Engineering had sales of approximately 6.5 mln dlrs in the year ended March 31. Reuter
